column5: This was the scene at 4am on opening day.   This was the scene once daylight set in.   An opening day tradition: Laker Shore Lunch.   A few bonus brookies were caught along the way.   QC back lake 25'' laker.   Laker Brookie shot.
Super cool...that is the good stuff right there
Wow...nice opener man!  Gotta love getting into the back lakes.
nice fish!!  ive never caught a laker but its on the top of my list this year!
Winter camping in April, hardcore  Nice fishies, too!!
Thanks for sharing. Great looking fish. I recognize the speckled.
Its nice when you tough out the cold and it pays off!  Great show, some really beauti fish there!  LTF
This pic ,put me in the mood for deer hunt,n.LOL      Nice report.
Great lodging,lakeside I may add,up at the crack of dawn,doesn't get much better than that!!!!!,nice fish!
Very nice! I can relate to the cold, it was minus 10 Sat morning where I was.
Thanks to all for the kind words.
Know what you mean Mike - I would have sworn it was -20 on that morning.  Froze my @#$ off. Miro
Apart from freezing tour butt, how was the fishing?
